last_episode_to_air.name: Season Finale : The End Game
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bose uses the Azad Hind Radio from Berlin to connect with Indians. Will this lead to a revolution in India?

name: Bose: Dead/Alive
overview: The man. The legend. The mystery. He fascinated us in life, and long after his "death". This is the story of India's biggest cover-up: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose and the mystery of his alleged death.

episodes.name: Dead or Alive
episodes.overview: The mysterious plane crash. Memories of a young Bose are recalled as rumours of his death begin to surface.

episodes.name: Bane of the British Raj
episodes.overview: A revolutionary in the making. Bose gets a prestigious job in England, but will his heart allow him to serve the British?

episodes.name: Catch Me If You Can
episodes.overview: Under constant surveillance. As the British send agents to spy on Bose, his actions continue to baffle them all.

episodes.name: The Japanese Connection
episodes.overview: Bose gets elected as the mayor of Calcutta. Is the beginning of a new revolution?

episodes.name: The Gold Trail
episodes.overview: Bose returns to Calcutta to raise his own army. Will the British spare him? Drama, Biopic.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Darbari asks Bose to accept British government’s conditions for bail. Will he bow down to the British?

episodes.name: Lost And Found
episodes.overview: The British officials try to trace Bose’s escape route. Will they be able to trace him?

episodes.name: Escape To Afghanistan
episodes.overview: British officials put Bose under house arrest. How long will they be able to stop him?

episodes.name: Season Finale : The End Game
episodes.overview: Bose uses the Azad Hind Radio from Berlin to connect with Indians. Will this lead to a revolution in India?
